metadata.inclusion:
To include our device into a controller.
1. Perform 'Include' on the controller.
2. From the lock's main menu item "7.Z-Wave", select the "Z-WaveInclusion" option by using the arrow keys to scroll to it and then pressing 'M' to select it. After a few seconds, you should see " Success" on the lock
metadata.exclusion:
To exclude our device into a controller.
1. Perform 'Exclude' on the controller.
2. From the lock's main menu item "7.Z-Wave", select the "Z-WaveExclusion" option by using the arrow keys to scroll to it and then pressing 'M' to select it. After a few seconds, you should see " Success" on the lock
metadata.reset:
If your controller fails or is replaced or if you need to perform a Factory reset on the device so that an inclusion may be performed again or with a new controller. Factory reset can be done on the device by selecting 'Hard Reset' from the Main Menu on device's display and pressing the M button. When prompted to reset is complete the display with return to the Main Menu.
Note: When a Hard Reset is completed, the Z-Wave node id is initialized to 0 and the device can't be controlled by Z-Wave. In order to control the device again, the controller needs to include the device on Z-Wave network.Please use this procedure only when the network primary controller is missing or otherwise inoperable
